languages.text: {n}Маражай недоуменно моргает, чуть склоняет голову — и издает изумленный смешок.{/n} "Свет Ильмей, ты прав{mf||а}! Ты опустошен! Что произошло, Назракей? Почему великий архонт Черного сердца не таится в Паутине, а выполз в охотничьи угодья Сай'лантреш? Неужели... его... выгнали?"

{n}Marazhai blinks in confusion, tilts his head, and lets out an amazed chuckle.{/n} "By the suns' light, you are not wrong! You are withered! What happened, Nazrakhei? Why did the mighty Archon of the Black Heart not remain lurking in the Webway, but instead chose to crawl out into Sai'lanthresh's hunting grounds? Has he been... driven out?"
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай недоуменно моргает, чуть склоняет голову — и издает изумленный смешок.{/n} "Свет Ильмей, ты прав{mf||а}! Ты опустошен! Что произошло, Назракей? Почему великий архонт Черного сердца не таится в Паутине, а выполз в охотничьи угодья Сай'лантреш? Неужели... его... выгнали?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai blinks perplexedly, tilts his head, and lets out an amazed chuckle.{/n} "By the suns' light, you are not wrong! You are withered! What happened, Nazrakhei? Why does the mighty Archon of the Black Heart not lurk in the Webway but has crawled out into Sai'lanthresh's hunting grounds? Has he... been... driven away?"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai blinzelt verwirrt, legt seinen Kopf schief und stößt ein erstauntes Lachen aus.{/n} "Beim Licht der Sonnen, Ihr habt nicht unrecht! Ihr seid verkümmert! Was ist geschehen, Nazrakhei? Warum ist der mächtige Archont des Schwarzens Herzens nicht in seinem Versteck im Netz der Tausend Tore geblieben, sondern stattdessen in Sai'lanthreshs Jagdrevier hinausgekrochen? Wurde er gar ... hinausgetrieben?"
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai blinks in confusion, tilts his head, and lets out an amazed chuckle.{/n} "By the suns' light, you are not wrong! You are withered! What happened, Nazrakhei? Why did the mighty Archon of the Black Heart not remain lurking in the Webway, but instead chose to crawl out into Sai'lanthresh's hunting grounds? Has he been... driven out?"

Was ist geschehen, Nazrakhei? Warum ist der mächtige Archont des Schwarzens Herzens nicht in seinem Versteck im Netz der Tausend Tore geblieben, sondern stattdessen in Sai'lanthreshs Jagdrevier hinausgekrochen? Wurde er gar ... hinausgetrieben?"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋困惑地眨了眨眼，歪着头，之后惊讶地笑了起来。{/n}“以恒星之光起誓，你说得没错！你枯萎了！这到底是怎么回事，纳扎骸？为什么强大的黑心执政官没有继续潜伏在网道中，而是爬进了赛·兰斯雷什的狩猎场？难道是……他被赶了出来？”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai blinks in confusion, tilts his head, and lets out an amazed chuckle.{/n} "By the suns' light, you are not wrong! You are withered! What happened, Nazrakhei? Why did the mighty Archon of the Black Heart not remain lurking in the Webway, but instead chose to crawl out into Sai'lanthresh's hunting grounds? Has he been... driven out?"

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋困惑地眨了眨眼，歪着头，之后惊讶地笑了起来。{/n}“以恒星之光起誓，你说得没错！你枯萎了！这到底是怎么回事，纳扎骸？为什么强大的黑心执政官没有继续潜伏在网道中，而是爬进了赛·兰斯雷什的狩猎场？难道是……他被赶了出来？”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Surpris, Marazhai cligne des yeux et incline la tête pour laisser échapper un rire étonné.{/n} « Par l'éclat des soleils, vous avez raison ! Vous êtes flétri ! Que s'est-il passé, Nazrakhei ? Pourquoi le puissant archonte du Cœur Noir n'est-il pas resté tapi au creux de la Toile, au lieu de s'embourber sur le terrain de chasse de Sai'lanthresh ? A-t-il été... chassé ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai blinks in confusion, tilts his head, and lets out an amazed chuckle.{/n} "By the suns' light, you are not wrong! You are withered! What happened, Nazrakhei? Why did the mighty Archon of the Black Heart not remain lurking in the Webway, but instead chose to crawl out into Sai'lanthresh's hunting grounds? Has he been... driven out?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Surpris, Marazhai cligne des yeux et incline la tête pour laisser échapper un rire étonné.{/n} « Par l'éclat des soleils, vous avez raison ! Vous êtes flétri ! Que s'est-il passé, Nazrakhei ? Pourquoi le puissant archonte du Cœur Noir n'est-il pas resté tapi au creux de la Toile, au lieu de s'embourber sur le terrain de chasse de Sai'lanthresh ? A-t-il été... chassé ? »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai pestañea, confuso, inclina la cabeza y suelta una carcajada asombrada.{/n} «Por los soles, ¡tienes razón! ¡Estás marchito! ¿Qué te ha pasado, Nazrakhei? ¿Por qué el poderoso Arconte del Corazón Negro no ha permanecido al acecho en la Telaraña, sino que ha entrado en los terrenos de caza de Sai'lanthresh? ¿Acaso ha sido... expulsado?».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai blinks in confusion, tilts his head, and lets out an amazed chuckle.{/n} "By the suns' light, you are not wrong! You are withered! What happened, Nazrakhei? Why did the mighty Archon of the Black Heart not remain lurking in the Webway, but instead chose to crawl out into Sai'lanthresh's hunting grounds? Has he been... driven out?"

traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}マラズハイは困惑から目を瞬かせてから首を傾け、面白そうにほくそ笑む。{/n}「たしかに、お前は間違っていないな！お前は枯れ果てている！何があった、ナズラクヘイ？黒き心臓の強大なアーコンはなぜ網辻に隠れたままでいずに、セランスレッシュの狩場にのこのこ這い出ることにしたんだ？奴は…締め出されたのか？」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai blinks in confusion, tilts his head, and lets out an amazed chuckle.{/n} "By the suns' light, you are not wrong! You are withered! What happened, Nazrakhei? Why did the mighty Archon of the Black Heart not remain lurking in the Webway, but instead chose to crawl out into Sai'lanthresh's hunting grounds? Has he been... driven out?"

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイは困惑から目を瞬かせてから首を傾け、面白そうにほくそ笑む。{/n}「たしかに、お前は間違っていないな！お前は枯れ果てている！何があった、ナズラクヘイ？黒き心臓の強大なアーコンはなぜ網辻に隠れたままでいずに、セランスレッシュの狩場にのこのこ這い出ることにしたんだ？奴は…締め出されたのか？」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai; kafası karışmış bir şekilde gözlerini kırpıyor, başını yana yatırıyor ve hayret dolu bir kahkaha patlatıyor.{/n} "Güneşlerin ışıkları adına, haksız değilsin! Solmuşsun! Ne oldu Nazrakhei? Kudretli Kara Yürek Arkonu neden Ağyol'da değil? Neden Sai'lanthresh'in av sahalarında dolanmayı tercih ediyor? Yoksa... Seni kovdular mı?"
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai blinks in confusion, tilts his head, and lets out an amazed chuckle.{/n} "By the suns' light, you are not wrong! You are withered! What happened, Nazrakhei? Why did the mighty Archon of the Black Heart not remain lurking in the Webway, but instead chose to crawl out into Sai'lanthresh's hunting grounds? Has he been... driven out?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai kafası karışmış bir şekilde gözlerini kırpıyor, başını yana yatırıyor ve hayrete düşmüş bir kahkaha patlatıyor.{/n} "Güneşlerin ışıkları adına, haksız değilsin! Solmuşsun! Ne oldu Nazrakhei? Kara Yürek'in kudretli Arkon'u neden Ağyol'da değil? Neden Sai'lanthresh'in av sahalarında takılmayı seçiyor? Yoksa... Dışarı mı atıldı?"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
